title: James A Garfield National Historic Site: Archive
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases     Archive                Archive           Subscribe  | What is RSS     August 02, 2012  Major Battles of the Civil War  Major Battles of the Civil War program on August 8 focuses on Battle of Second Manassas. Garfield. Garfield National Historic Site   May 18, 2009  Memorial Day Hours at James A. Garfield NHS  .   May 16, 2009  The Grass is Greener Behind the Fence at the James A. Garfield National Historic Site  Weed Man from Euclid, Ohio donates lawn care services to the James A. Garfield National Historic Site on Earth Day.
